snippet: The markets sagged after initially cheering a positive development in the euro crisis.
abstract: Stock market shows little change as investors turn cautious before a Federal Reserve decision on another round of monetary stimulus to bolster the economy.
lead_paragraph: The markets sagged after initially cheering a positive development in the euro crisis.

headline.seo: Ahead of Fed Decision, Investors Hold Their Ground
headline.main: Ahead of Fed Decision on Possible Stimulus, Investors Hold Their Ground
headline.print_headline: Ahead of Fed Decision on Possible Stimulus, Investors Hold Their Ground
